Combo.Name: Toxic Lash
Combo.Effects: Inflict 1 petrification on the attack target.

Actions.Name: Tail Slash
Actions.Description: A foe in range, takes 2 damage, is dazed, and infected with a petrifying poison. At the end of their next turn, they take 1 petrification unless they end that turn adjacent to one or more allies. Then, this effect ends. This effect does not stack.

Actions.Name: Gall Stone
Actions.Description: The [name] spits up a height 1 object, a pillar of toxic bile, in range. Foes that end their turn adjacent to one or more of these pillars gain 1 petrification per pillar.
